items.headline: What Can Parents and Teens Do to Manage Anxiety?
objectives_summary: The difference between positive stress, negative stress, and clinical anxiety
Current trends and rates of anxiety amongst teens
Shifts in society, adolescent development, and family structure that have contributed to an increase in anxiety

items.title: Parenting skills: teach your children to speak clearly

visible_instructors.name: Serena

items.headline: Teaching children at home is difficult but you can easily teach them to communicate more effectively
objectives_summary: How to help and encourage children to speak with ease, clearly and confidently.
Your children will be able to communicate with clarity
Your children will be able to articulate well

items.title: Parent with knowledge about parenting make child responsible
items.headline: Is there an action plan to succed on Raising Responsible Kids?
objectives_summary: Your child will have more finished chores at home from tomorrow morning
You will have  the control of toys that are all over the space
You will have extra free time to enjoy with your child or for your self as a parent

items.title: REAL Stress Management for Moms of Kids Who Struggle
items.headline: Tips to help you and your child reduce stress and thrive in the most challenging parenting moments.
objectives_summary: Get tips from a psychologist for navigating life's most stressful parenting moments like when you yell at your kid and then you hate yourself.
Effectively cope with the exhaustion, isolation and chronic worry that go with parenting a child with a learning disability or medical condition.
React helpfully when you and your child are both over-stressed.

items.title: Healthy and Successful Relationships with PDA and Autism
items.headline: A Different Approach to Peaceful Relationships with PDAers (pathological demand avoidance)
objectives_summary: How to solve any problem in any relationship.
How to drop expectations and love unconditionally.
How to set healthy boundaries.

items.title: How to Create an Authentic and Successful Open Marriage
items.headline: The Art of Open Relating: Volume 1 - Theory, Philosophy, & Foundation
objectives_summary: Students will understand the ins and outs of moving from a monogamous relationship/marriage to an open marriage.

items.title: Motherhood Meditations: Mindfully Get Ready for Baby
items.headline: Guided meditations to help moms meditate their way to a peaceful pregnancy and an intuitive motherhood experience.
objectives_summary: Let go of feeling overwhelmed and confused by information overload by tapping into our intuition and guidance by moving from our heads to our hearts and connecting with our spirit guides and the spirit of our baby.
Forget the idea of trying to be the perfect mom by feeling worthy and capable of being a mother just as we are.
Prevent burnout and maintain our balance by visualizing and using the power of feminine to attract the support we will need and allowing others to hold us up and help.

items.title: Parenting To Potential: Awaken To Your Parent Power

visible_instructors.job_title: Sallie Justice Coaching ~ Make it Clear, Make it Possible!
visible_instructors.title: Sallie Justice
visible_instructors.name: Sallie

items.headline: Wake up to how the way you were raised affects your children's expression of power in their life.
objectives_summary: Explore, understand, and integrate concepts that help create a positive and effective parenting experience for you and your child (based on western cultural values).
Discover ways to gain freedom from unconscious beliefs, habits and responses that inhibit your potential and your child's potential.
Apply these concepts and knowledge to your own experience as a child, and now as a parent.

items.title: Relationship Coaching Toolkit: Transform, Heal & Grow Love

visible_instructors.title: Sonya Wilkins
visible_instructors.name: Sonya

items.headline: How To Heal Love & Grow More Love With Your Partner, Children & Significant Others. Simple Tools, Powerful Outcomes!
objectives_summary: Understand what YOU need in order to grow all types of loving relationships in your life
Identify what 'love language' others speak, so you can understand & satisfy each other's needs
Understand the difference between 'in love' & 'true love' experiences and the nourishing value in each

items.title: Domestic Violence and Abuse Awareness Course
items.headline: Learn how to deal with domestic abuse and violence and help protect those vulnerable individuals who suffer terribly.
objectives_summary: Being knowledgeable about Domestic Violence & Abuse
Being familiar with the components of domestic violence
Gain an understanding of the impact of domestic violence on victims

items.title: Parenting and Emotional Bonding
items.headline: Skills for parenting and sorting the Emotional Bonding problems from the conception to the teenage
objectives_summary: By the completion of this course, will understand more about parent and child emotional bonding and will be able to regulate and build stronger emotional bonding effectively.     The student completing this course will be able to eliminate accidental disengagement and have an on-going process of continuous emotional bonding improvement (kaizen).     The student completing this course will know the essential problem-solving methods employed in continuous improvement and will be able to lead the kids in constant improvement steadily.
Be able to understand and manage your child's emotional issues

items.title: Children’s TANTRUMS and MISBEHAVIOR'S
items.headline: This session discusses a few fantastic ways that makes kids cooperate & makes life easy for parents.
objectives_summary: How to handle Children’s TANTRUMS and MISBEHAVIOR'S?
How to make kids stay focused on one thing?
Kids refuse to help out at home. How to deal with such a situation?

items.title: Open Your Heart After A Disagreement
items.headline: A 5 step process to transform any personal or work relationship after an argument or disagreement.
objectives_summary: By the end of this course you will have learned how to recover from a disagreement or argument in any relationship (personal or professional).
You will learn a simple 5 step process to open your heart and make peace in any relationship.
You will learn how to take a different perspective that unites people and makes relationships work much better.

items.title: How love succeeds: Free yourself from the past!
items.headline: Leave the weakening influence of childhood, family and of your personal life behind you!
objectives_summary: You discover the obstacles that come from your childhood and family and you dissolve them
You transform transgenerational connections
You come in peace with former love relationships

items.title: Turning Jealousy into Gold
items.headline: Overcoming jealousy in the most loving and awesome way! So that your relationships and happiness can flourish.
objectives_summary: Disarm jealousy, so that jealousy won't ruin your relationship anymore
Able to not suppress jealousy but rather accept its presence and be okay with feeling it
Loving the person you're jealous of

items.title: Homeschool Master Course
items.headline: Learn the A-Zs of homeschooling from a veteran homeschooling mom.
objectives_summary: Know the different homeschool options available and feel confident in choosing what will work for your family.
